metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40904 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: The web management console of CheckMK Raw Edition (versions 1.5.0 to 1.6.0) allows a misconfiguration of the web-app Dokuwiki (installed by default), which allows embedded php code. As a result, remote code execution is achieved. Successful exploitation requires access to the web management interface, either with valid credentials or with a hijacked session by a user with the role of administrator.

notes.Note: 0xnishit> Remove dokuwiki: https://github.com/tribe29/checkmk/commit/44e4b1a77d3aeee4bc835d3858fcc1bb00b80072 upstream removed the whole module and therefore we won't be applying a fix

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
